Most Illustrious Sir

I received oral orders from the Most Excellent Sir Bento Manuel Ribeiro to send the prisoner Sezefredo Nunes to the brigade of Your Lordship, Captain Fortunato Francisco da Silva, to serve in his post among the forces of the 2nd and 3rd districts, appointed by Your Lordship Brigadeer Bento Manuel to go to the province of Corrientes to negotiate political matters with Lope Chico. The same captain says that there are 50 horses from his command waiting for orders from Your Lordship.

May God keep Your Lordship

Barracks at Alegrete, December 16, 1837.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Colonel Commander of the Right Division. José Inácio da Silva Abreu, Lieutenant Colonel Interim Commander of the Frontier.

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira, Colonel Commander of the Right Division. From the Lieutenant Colonel Interim Commander of the Frontier. Answered.
